page.title: 08Dining Out
page.content: Visitors to this area have a good choice of eating places.In this area alone there are at least four restaurants and in some of the hotels their restaurants are open to non_residents,some of which specialise in locally caught seafood. There are a number of cafes catering for snack type meals and one hotel has a take_away service in addition to its restaurant.There are several pubs which serve bar snacks at lunchtime and suppertime,and have gardens in which visitors can soak up the atmosphere and have a good meal at the same time. {Population.}This area has a small population which tends to be isolated from the rest of Cornwall.For this reason many people own their own car which they use for commuting and general travel in and outside the area
